snippet: Richmond, Tex., seemed to fall still on Monday during the memorial service for Hilmar G. Moore, who was appointed mayor in 1949 and was elected 32 times.
abstract: Richmond, Tex, mourns loss of Hilmar G Moore, cattle rancher who was appointed mayor in 1949 and elected 32 times; town officials believe Moore was longest-serving mayor in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Richmond, Tex., seemed to fall still on Monday during the memorial service for Hilmar G. Moore, who was appointed mayor in 1949 and was elected 32 times.

headline.seo: Richmond, Tex., Mourns Mayor Hilmar G. Moore
headline.main: Town Mourns a Mayor Who Had Staying Power
headline.print_headline: Town Mourns a Mayor Who Had Staying Power
